about_the_game:
The presented screenshots do not reflect the finished product; the game is still in development, and this page will be updated with progress.

"Tyrants came from the stars plunging our world into hoplessnes, now i have become next victim to be exposed to the horrors of their rule, unlike those before me though, I'm ready to do whatever it takes to survive..."

You have been cast into dungeons, mysterious place used by powerful race of star travelers to experiment on all living things. By progressing through you will discover results of this horrific experiments.

Skiv is dungeon crawler focused on time and resource management. It features turn based combat which demands good decision making around limited resources where death has consequences.

  • Skin carcasses of defeated enemies for valuable body parts which you can use to become stronger but beware of the price.

  • System of risk and reward based around managing time and resources, will you take safest path to the end or will you sacrifice current resources for potential rewards?

  • Turn based combat demanding strategic use of the limited resources, and bosses with uniqe fighting styles.

  • Dark and rich lore waiting to be uncovered and put together.

name: Skiv
short_description: Skiv is a dungeon crawler RPG set in dark fantasy world. With systems blending turn based combat and soulslike elements.
